page.description: Return difference of minutes between two dates or times.
page.prototype: dim Result as N = *MINUTES_BETWEEN(t1 as T, t2 as T)

return.name: Result
return.description: Returns the minutes between two dates or times. If *[xb:t2]* is a date or time later than *[xb:t1]*, *MINUTES_BETWEEN will return a negative value.

page.example:
dim in as T = ctodt("10/01/2017 8:30 AM") dim out as T = ctodt("10/01/2017 6:45 PM")
? *minutes_between(in, out) = -615
? *minutes_between(out, in) = 615
